83b1('bum): yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor byang chub kyis yan lag rnam
83b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
83b3('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs
83b4('bum): so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag/ tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam/ pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams bsam
83b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
83b6('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
83b7('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
83b8('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor
84a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor/  nge 'dzin rnams pasam gyis mi khyad dang / 
84a2('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig
84a3('bum): so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam
84a4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor so so yang dag da par rig pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
84a5('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
84a6('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
84a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
84a8('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab
84b1('bum): 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
84b2('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor
84b3('bum): lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
84b4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad rang du/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
84b5('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs pa/ lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu/ ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
84b6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed
84b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
84b8('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
85a1('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rnab bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis
85a2('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
85a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
85a4('bum): yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma dmachis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
85a5('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
85a6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
85a7('bum): ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi/ 
85a8('bum): shing nga mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnye ba dang mnyis mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
85b1('bum): du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi
85b2('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi
85b3('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
85b4('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
85b5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma ma// tshis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam/ pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg
85b6('bum): pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
85b7('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
85b8('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
86a1('bum): slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te/ 
86a2('bum): reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis ma
86a3('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/ 
86a4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dmi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
86a5('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma ma
86a6('bum): shing nga mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
86a7('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
86a8('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam
86b1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
86b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ 
86b3('bum): ci'i slad du namakha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab
86b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du dpag tu ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzha
86b5('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmi sa pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khya dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
86b6('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
86b7('bum): slad du ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab
86b8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
87a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag/ 
87a2('bum): ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga
87a3('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
87a4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma dmachis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam dpa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis
87a5('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
87a6('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
87a7('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
87a8('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ 
87b1('bum): ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87b2('bum): phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
87b3('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
87b4('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid pas dam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /  mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
87b5('bum): du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma ma chis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid
87b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gas
87b7('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
87b8('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
88a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med
88a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
88a3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
88a4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
88a5('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
88a6('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos
88a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
88a8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid pas gyi mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
88b1('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
88b2('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
88b3('bum): du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
88b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
88b5('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
88b6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
88b7('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
88b8('bum): srad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam
89a1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam
89a2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
89a3('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
89a4('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/  ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / ma tshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
89a5('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par/ shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
89a6('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
89a7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin
89a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi
89b1('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
89b2('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnye
89b3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs
89b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dang ngag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam da pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu
89b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
89b6('bum): 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab
89b7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
89b8('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ 
90a1('bum): ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du dam/ 
90a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90a3('bum): stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / mi
90a4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bas dpa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi da migaso// rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag
90a5('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'a khyor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma nyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam pa
90a6('bum): shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mig la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab
90a7('bum): 'byor rna ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sna la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor
90a8('bum): lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pad+ma tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnye ba mi dmigaso/ rab 'byor yid la yang
90b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sgra la
90b2('bum): yang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ro la
90b3('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos
90b4('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya/ ma pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes dpa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
90b5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes
90b6('bum): pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
90b7('bum): son rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
90b8('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg
91a1('bum): pal yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dngag pa dang chung dang mnyam/ 
91a2('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la
91a3('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag yad tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
91a4('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
91a5('bum): tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa/ dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
91a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa daci'i nyim mi dmig go// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus
91a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
91a8('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chu'i khams la yang
91b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor me'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor
91b2('bum): rlung gi khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
91b3('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ma rig pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
91b4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab ra 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam pa
91b5('bum): shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam/ pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor ming dang ga/ zugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
91b6('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye mched drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
91b7('bum): ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sred pa la yang
91b8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor len pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor srid pa
92a1('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
92a2('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor rga shi la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
92a3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha
92a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang man/ ma pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
92a5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byo ra bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
92a6('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
92a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang
92a8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso/ 
92b1('bum): rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dngag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi/ 
92b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam
92b3('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
92b4('bum): rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dadamigaso// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang
92b5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ya nga bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
92b6('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong / 
92b7('bum): pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi/ 
92b8('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang
93a1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
93a2('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpog pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 
93a3('bum): rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
93a4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// / rab 'byor dbang po rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag/ da pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 
93a5('bum): rab 'byor stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang
93a6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
93a7('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams la yang bas
93a8('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
93b1('bum): rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams la yang
93b2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
93b3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
93b4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 
93b5('bum): rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs // / rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag
93b6('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
93b7('bum): so/ darab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang
93b8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
94a1('bum): rab 'byor snying rje chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang
94a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 
94a3('bum): rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
94a4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rang
94a5('bum): byang chub la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa/ dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
94a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig so// gsol pa
94a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
94a8('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang
94b1('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
94b2('bum): slad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
94b3('bum): ba lags/ ci'i slad du sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya
94b4('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmi gas pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag
94b5('bum): ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa la/ gas/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ 
94b6('bum): ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
94b7('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
94b8('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagasaci'i slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam
95a1('bum): dang drug pa da dang mnas pa da mamanyam pa mi rigs pa lags/  pa rnam pa shes pa la bsam pa dang phyug pa dang cad dang ma ma dam
95a2('bum): ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snga'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la bas
95a3('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
95a4('bum): ba lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dung dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi mi dgus pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa
95a5('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam par
95a6('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg
95a7('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
95a8('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
95b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dngag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
95b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
95b3('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg
95b4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma danyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bas
95b5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi ma
95b6('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams la bsam pa dang
95b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gis khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
95b8('bum): ci'i slad du na mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
96a1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ 
96a2('bum): ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
96a3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug la bsam pa dang
96a4('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa nga lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
96a5('bum): tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sre// da pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
96a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
96a7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi la
96a8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
96b1('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol
96b2('bum): tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
96b3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
96b4('bum): slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa la dgas/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa
96b5('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag/ sa ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dang / ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
96b6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
96b7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
96b8('bum): ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
97a1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
97a2('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la
97a3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
97a4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dadang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmi rags pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid
97a5('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi ma/ tshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
97a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
97a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
97a8('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
97b1('bum): slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
97b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
97b3('bum): slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya/ 
97b4('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan ralag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags
97b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang / 
97b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// 
97b7('bum): ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa
97b8('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
98a1('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
98a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par
98a3('bum): shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
98a4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyadam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
98a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang da nga dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la
98a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya
98a7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang
98a8('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
98b1('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
98b2('bum): 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnye
98b3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang
98b4('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
98b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya/ ma pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan
98b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang
98b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tsher
98b8('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang man
99a1('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
99a2('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bas
99a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnaM pa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi ngo
99a4('bum): bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnye pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
99a5('bum): rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/ gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
99a6('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
99a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa
99a8('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam
99b1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir/ 
99b2('bum): yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi banyi da ma
99b3('bum): ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnya dang / 
99b4('bum): ste de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor/ dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
99b5('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa/ dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
99b6('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
99b7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid
99b8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor/ 
100a1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa
100a2('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
100a3('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
100a4('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste// de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag rapa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
100a5('bum): rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa/ dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la
100a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
100a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid
100a8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
100b1('bum): so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag
100b2('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
100b3('bum): phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal/ 
100b4('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te/ 
100b5('bum): reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du/ med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce/ 'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
100b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus
100b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
100b8('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
101a1('bum): gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag
101a2('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
101a3('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo
101a4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
101a5('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyi/ sa mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
101a6('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
101a7('bum): tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
101a8('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
101b1('bum): phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
101b2('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid
101b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab
101b4('bum): 'byor me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
101b5('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rlung gi kha mas kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzha la du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi
101b6('bum): khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
101b7('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir na mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
101b8('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab
102a1('bum): 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
102a2('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa
102a3('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna
102a4('bum): par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor ming dang gzu gas kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
102a5('bum): med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang / gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya ma pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye mched
102a6('bum): drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso
102a7('bum): rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
102a8('bum): dmigaso// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
102b1('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
102b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa
102b3('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa
102b4('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam/ pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam/ gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
102b5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
102b6('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
102b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
102b8('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims
103a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu/ 
103a2('bum): med gzhal du med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha/ 
103a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
103a4('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
103a5('bum): bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dang / ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
103a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
103a7('bum): rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya
103a8('bum): pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
103b1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid
103b2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
103b3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
103b4('bum): tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor
103b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ga tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
103b6('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
103b7('bum): phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
103b8('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mtha' las
104a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam
104a2('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa
104a3('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
104a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
104a5('bum): pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med/ la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong
104a6('bum): ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la
104a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
104a8('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
104b1('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa
104b2('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnya
104b3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bas
104b4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa da dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
104b5('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
104b6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
104b7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// / 
104b8('bum): rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa
105a1('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
105a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
105a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
105a4('bum): rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ngag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
105a5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'tsho/ ra byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
105a6('bum): ba ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam
105a7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
105a8('bum): mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi nya mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
105b1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
105b2('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
105b3('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzugs/ 
105b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms
105b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad da/ nga mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
105b6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mthar
105b7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
105b8('bum): dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid
106a1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
106a2('bum): med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
106a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
106a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi maHdam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam sa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
106a5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzha la du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzung
106a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
106a7('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mi/ 
106a8('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
106b1('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so
106b2('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
106b3('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo
106b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mau ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la ga dasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
106b5('bum): dmig so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
106b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
106b7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor
106b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpags
107a1('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa da
107a2('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi/ 
107a3('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab
107a4('bum): 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / 
107a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu maud gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
107a6('bum): ste de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
107a7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
107a8('bum): so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bcu bzhi pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
107b1('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmig su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
107b2('bum): tshor ba dmigasu yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmigasu yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam
107b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
107b4('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
107b5('bum): pa de la mig dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyi sa mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna
107b6('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de lnga dmigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
107b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam/ 
107b8('bum): yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
108a1('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ 
108a2('bum): de la sgra dmigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
108a3('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
108a4('bum): reg dmigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par
108a5('bum): shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du/ med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig/ gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par
108a6('bum): shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis
108a7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnas
108a8('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnya
108b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ 
108b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa
108b3('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna
108b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bas
108b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi maH/ ma pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmi gas su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis
108b6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
108b7('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
108b8('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam
109a1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
109a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te
109a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ 
109a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa drang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
109a5('bum): ba dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye/ na gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/ gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid
