177a2('bum): su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
177a3('bum): phyin pas yong su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / chen
177a4('bum): po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yod dasu bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / 
177a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dz+ra ga ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rang bzhin
177a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / 
177a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis
177a8('bum): yongasu bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu
177b1('bum): bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / bsam gtan
177b2('bum): rnams kyis yongasu bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung
177b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung / mngon par shes
177b4('bum): pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung / 
177b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu bzung / so so yang dag pa ra rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung / byams pa chen pos/ yongasu bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung gsangs
177b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
177b7('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar me dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla
177b8('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir// 
178a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/ 
178a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don tu/ 
178a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legaso leg so// rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongasu gtong na de bdag dang bdag
178a4('bum): gir lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / tshul/ khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson/ 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug
178a5('bum): pa dang / shes rab sgom na de yang bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongasu gto nga ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu
178a6('bum): gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims bsrung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 
178a7('bum): bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang / 
178a8('bum): ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// 
178b1('bum): shes rab ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sas/ 
178b2('bum): su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su
178b3('bum): byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rloms semasu byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ 
178b4('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su bye dra/ de bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag
178b5('bum): ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes/ rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rloms/ mas su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes
178b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178b7('bum): la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
178b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du
179a1('bum): song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de lta yin/ 
179a2('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179a3('bum): yongasu ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / shes
179a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / nang stong pa/ nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis so// ngasu ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung
179a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yong
179a6('bum): su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 
179a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis
179a8('bum): yongasu ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo
179b1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yong su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis song / 
179b2('bum): su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
179b3('bum): brgyad pas yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzugs
179b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yong
179b5('bum): su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yong su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu ma
179b6('bum): bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis
179b7('bum): yongasu ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongasu ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
179b8('bum): pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
180a1('bum): kyis yong su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ji ltar na gang zag bya/ 
180a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ thog mar thabs med par sbyin pa yong su gtong / thabs med
180a3('bum): par tshul khrims srung / thabs med par bzod pa sgom/ thabs med par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs med par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs med par shes rab sgom zhing
180a4('bum): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di yid su gtong ngo // 'di la ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // 
180a5('bum): tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pasgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus pa rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni
180a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes/ de sbyin pa rlom
180a7('bum): sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su
180a8('bum): byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom
180b1('bum): sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom
180b2('bum): sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems
180b3('bum): su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// 
180b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa rtog pa de dag tshul
180b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam
180b6('bum): par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// 
180b7('bum): ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ 
180b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam
181a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// de ci'i phyir/ 
181a2('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol yang
181a3('bum): mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / brtson 'grus
181a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid
181a5('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chen po stong
181a6('bum): pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung // mtha'
181a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
181a8('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 
181b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa pha ba nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhug
181b2('bum): pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung // stobs
181b3('bum): rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
181b4('bum): yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma ba zung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yod/ 
181b5('bum): su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ sa yongasu ma bzung // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
181b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
181b7('bum): yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung // byams
181b8('bum): pa chen pos yongasu ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung // 
182a1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ 
182a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasasu bzung ba/ nyan
182a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems
182a4('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i thog mar sbyin pa yongasu gtong na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin dpa yongasu gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung na bdag dang
182a5('bum): bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims sru nga ngo // bzod pa sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya ba ra ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo// brtson
182a6('bum): 'grus rtsom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam
182a7('bum): gtan sgom mo// shes rab sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab bsgom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa
182a8('bum): gtong ngo // zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa
182b1('bum): ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rlom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par
182b2('bum): 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de sbyin
182b3('bum): pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed/ tshul khrims
182b4('bum): kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang lnga na pa'o// zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// / bzod pa rlom sems su mi byed bzod pas rlom sems
182b5('bum): su mi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rnaM ma sems su mi byed do// brtson 'grus rlom sem/ su mi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 
182b6('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni
182b7('bum): bsam gtan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar
182b8('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gi de rlom semasu byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha
183a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med/ 'di ltar tshul
183a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med do// 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha
183a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus
183a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 
183a5('bum): 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
183a6('bum): tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang / ring du song ba
183a7('bum): shes shing / pha rol shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
183a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
183b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
183b2('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
183b3('bum): 'grub par 'gyuraro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
183b4('bum): 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ba bzung bas// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sarami ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub
183b5('bum): par 'gyuraro// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
183b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung
183b7('bum): bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos
183b8('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
184a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
184a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
184a3('bum): mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam
184a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas / nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mo ltung ste/ 
184a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzu nga bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
184a6('bum): ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa
184a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
184a8('bum): nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub
184b1('bum): par 'gyuraro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// 
184b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa
184b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu
184b4('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi da ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
184b5('bum): yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
184b6('bum): kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu
184b7('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ 
184b8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
185a1('bum): kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung
185a2('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
185a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
185a4('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i bden pa ba de zhis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sang / ngas rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
185a5('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// bsam gtan bzhis yongasu bzu nga bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
185a6('bum): 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// gzugs med pa'i
185a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// rnam par thar pa
185a8('bum): brgyad kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
185b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
185b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// mngon par
185b3('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu
185b4('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grubadapar 'gyuraro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ 
185b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yong su bzung bas/ 
185b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
185b7('bum): kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
185b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
186a1('bum): nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
186a2('bum): 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
186a3('bum): 'gyuraro// thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// lam gyi rnam
186a4('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa la dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa tham das cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rnam pa thad
186a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
186a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya bcu dgu pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
186a7('bum): yongasu bzung ba/ thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol
186a8('bum): tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ phyi stong pa
186b1('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
186b2('bum): yongasu bzung ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ thog ma dang tha ma
186b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba/ 
186b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ dngos/ po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
186b5('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
186b6('bum): kyis yongasu bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
186b7('bum): kyis yongasu bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba/ bsam gtan gzhis yongasu bzung ba/ tshad med pa
186b8('bum): bzhis yongasu bzung ba/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
187a1('bum): dgus yongasu bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu bcu
187a2('bum): ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu bzung
187a3('bum): ba so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba/ byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu
187a4('bum): bzung ba/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba/ 
187a5('bum): de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byo ra ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
187a6('bum): 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ thog mar thabs dang ldan par sbyin pa yongasu gtong / thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa sgom/ 
187a7('bum): thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs dang ldan par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang ldan par shes rab sgom zhing 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // 
187a8('bum): sbyin pa 'di yongasu gtong ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrim ni 'di srung ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// 
187b1('bum): bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par
187b2('bum): 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom
187b3('bum): sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems
187b4('bum): su mi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom de sems su mi byed do// de bzod pa rlom sems su mi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni
187b5('bum): bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de brtson 'grus rlom sems su mi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus
187b6('bum): dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de bsam gtan rlom sems su mi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su
187b7('bum): mi byed do// de shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
187b8('bum): de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin
188a1('bum): pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta
188a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
188a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag
188a4('bum): med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas
188a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu
188a6('bum): phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
188a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yang yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing / pha rol shes kyang / des rlom
188a8('bum): sems med de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasasu bzung ba dang / 
188b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yong su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yong su bzung ba dang / thabs maH/ 
188b2('bum): pas yongasasu bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
188b3('bum): yongasu bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas
188b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das dpa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / thog ma dang / da tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / dor
188b5('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / chos tham/ sa cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / rang gi ma
188b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
188b7('bum): yongasu bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyi ci yongasu bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu
188b8('bum): bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
189a1('bum): kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yong su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis
189a2('bum): yongasu bzung ba dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / 
189a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung ba dang / mngon
189a4('bum): par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi/ sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
189a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung ba dang / mi 'jig pa ba zhis yongasu bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs
189a6('bum): bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / lam gyi
189a7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
189a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu drug go// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan
189b1('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi
189b2('bum): ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ 
189b3('bum): ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la lnga
189b4('bum): dang po bI byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslabs par 'dod pa
189b5('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par 'du da pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab
189b6('bum): par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bslab par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ 
189b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de dag la ston par
189b8('bum): bya'o// bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na
190a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190a2('bum): byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu brtson
190a3('bum): 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de
190a4('bum): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
190a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar
190a6('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du shesu rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mig tu rtog par ma byed cig/ rna bar rtog par ma byed
190a7('bum): cig/ snar rtog par ma byed cig/ lcer rtog par ma byed cig/ lus su rtog par ma byed cig/ yid du rtog par ma byed cig/ gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ sgrar rtog par ma byed
190a8('bum): cig/ drir rtog par ma byed cig/ ror rtog par ma byed cig/ reg tu rtog par ma byed cig/ chos su rtog par ma byed cig/ mig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i
190b1('bum): rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed
190b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par
190b3('bum): ma byed cig/ lce'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ mig gi 'dus te reg
190b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed
190b5('bum): cig/ skye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog pa ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
190b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khamasu rtogs par ma byed cig/ chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ 
190b7('bum): mo'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ na mkha'i khamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes pa'i khamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ ma rig/ 
190b8('bum): par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtag par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ ming dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ skye mched drug tu rtog pa/ 
191a1('bum): ma byed cig/ reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sred par rtog par ma byed cig/ len par rtog par ma byed cig/ srid par
191a2('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ skye bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rga shir rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par/ 
191a3('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog
191a4('bum): par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu na par rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na
191a5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi stong pa nyid du rtog/ par ma byed cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
191a6('bum): cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du
191a7('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par
191a8('bum): ma byed cig/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rang gi mtshan
191b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
191b2('bum): cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnamasu rtog par ma byed ci
191b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnam su rtog par ma byed cig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam su rtog par ma byed cig/ dbang po rnam su rtog par ma byed cig/ stobs rnam su rtog par ma byed cig
191b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ lam rnamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan bzhi
191b5('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ tshad med pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par thar pa brgyad du
191b6('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par/ 
191b7('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa rnamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ ting nge 'dzin rnamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnamasu rtog par ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs
191b8('bum): pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig/ mi 'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ byams pa chen por rtog par ma
192a1('bum): byed cig/ snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192a2('bum): byang chub tu rtog par ma byed cig/ thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog
192a3('bum): par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongasu ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thad
192a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni/ rnam
192a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma
192a6('bum): brtags pa'i mig ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags
192a7('bum): pa'i sna ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lce ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lus ni/ 
192a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni/ 
192b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sgra ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i dri ni/ rnam pa thams
192b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i ro ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i reg ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
192b3('bum): par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i chos ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
192b4('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i rna dam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par
192b5('bum): shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya/ da do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
192b6('bum): yongasu ma brtags pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
192b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma rtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te
192b8('bum): reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtag/ 
193a1('bum): pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193a2('bum): thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi/ 
193a3('bum): tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
193a4('bum): yongasu ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
193a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad
193a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sa'i
193a7('bum): khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i chu'i khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i
193a8('bum): me'i khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma
193b1('bum): brtags pa'i rnamakha'i khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
193b2('bum): byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
193b3('bum): par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i ming dang gzugs ni/ rnam pa thams cad
193b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i skye mched drug ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni/ 
193b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yod/ sum brtags pa'i tshor ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sred
193b6('bum): pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i len pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i srid pa ni/ 
193b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rga shi ni/ rnam
193b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i
194a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam bzang
194a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i bsam
194a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
194a4('bum): par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i nang stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//  // yongasu ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thad
194a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa/ 'i phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i stong
194a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i chen po stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
194a7('bum): yongasu ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad
194a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mtha'
194b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
194b2('bum): thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ 
194b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags
194b4('bum): pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i nga mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
194b5('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i ngo bo
194b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed
194b7('bum): dod yongasu ma brtags pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ rnam pa
194b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i
195a1('bum): dbang po rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yong su ma brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
195a2('bum): yongasu ma brtags pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ rnam pa
195a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i bsam
195a4('bum): gtan rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ru byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i tshad med pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
195a5('bum): yongasu ma brtags pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ ga pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob/ par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa
195a6('bum): brgyad ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
195a7('bum): byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma
195a8('bum): brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
195b1('bum): byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ rnam pa
195b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag
195b3('bum): par rig pa bzhi ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma
195b4('bum): brtags pa'i snying rje chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ ngan pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sa rangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ rnam pa thad
195b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i// thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i
195b6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu khyod gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
195b7('bum): pa med pa ni gzugaso// tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ tshor ba'o// 'du shes la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// 
195b8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'du shes so// 'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma
196a1('bum): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'o// mig la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa/ 
196a2('bum): med pa ni mig go/ rna ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'o// sna la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod/ 
196a3('bum): pa med pa ni sna'o// lce la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni khye'o// lus la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
196a4('bum): med pa ni lus// yid la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid do// gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
196a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ gzugaso// sgra la 'dra da pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi glu 'dod pa med pa ni/ smra'o// dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ 
196a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dri'o// ro la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni ro'o// reg la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i
196a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni reg go// chos la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa
196a8('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa me ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa/ 
196b1('bum): med pa ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par/ 
196b2('bum): shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
196b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes
196b4('bum): pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma
196b5('bum): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med/ pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te re/ ga pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
196b6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ri gas kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// 
196b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
196b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
197a1('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa sde ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bal 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi phra/ 
197a2('bum): 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni
197a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
197a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/  rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i/ 
197a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
197a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sa'i khams// chu'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir
197a7('bum): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni chu'i khamaso// me'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni me'i kham so// rlung gi khams la 'dod pa
197a8('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ rlung gi khamaso// na mkha'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa
197b1('bum): nI na mkha'i khamaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par shes pa'i kham so// ma rig pa la 'dod pa ma skyed/ 
197b2('bum): cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni ma rig pa'o// 'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'du byed do// rnam par
197b3('bum): shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
197b4('bum): 'dod pa med pa ni ming dang gzug so// skye mched drug la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni skye mched drug go/ reg pa la 'dod pa
197b5('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni reg pa'o// tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni tsher
197b6('bum): ba'o// sred pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sred pa'o// len pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med
197b7('bum): pa ni len pa'o// srid pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni srid pa'o// skye ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod// 
197b8('bum): pa med pa ni skye ba'o// rga shi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir
198a1('bum): zhe na rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin+d+ha pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de rje'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
198a2('bum): 'dod pa med pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu
198a3('bum): byin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha
198a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ darigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha ro/ dal tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod
198a5('bum): ba ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
198a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la
198a7('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
198a8('bum): pa med pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa
198b1('bum): nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
198b2('bum): bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// 
198b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la
198b4('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i
198b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dor ba med pa stong / pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skye// da cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa
198b6('bum): ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni// chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid
198b7('bum): stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir/ 
198b8('bum): zhe nad rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dngos po med
199a1('bum): bstong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma sbed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa na dzi ma nyid stong pa nyid do// ngos po med pa'i ja
199a2('bum): stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
199a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam so// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yang
199a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnamaso// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'dra dad pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'a/ 'dod pa med pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamaso// dbang po
199a5('bum): rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi khu 'dod pa med pa ni dbang po rnam so// stobs rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
199a6('bum): 'dod pa med pa ni stobs rnam so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnam so// 'phags pa'i
199a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'dod
199a8('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam so// bsam gtan rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
199b1('bum): pa med pa ni bsam gtan rnam so// tshad med pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni tshad me rnam so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
199b2('bum): pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod lnga ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamaso// rnam par thar pa brgyad la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir
199b3('bum): zhe na/  rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa
199b4('bum): ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smo ngan pa med pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
199b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i
199b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mngon par shes pa rnamaso// ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams
199b7('bum): so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dod pa ma
199b8('bum): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnamaso// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
200a1('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mi 'jigs pa rnamaso// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi du 'dod pa med pa ni so so yang
200a2('bum): dag par rig pa rnam so// byams pa chen po la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/ 
200a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa
200a4('bum): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// thams cad shes pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyirazhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni thams cad shes pa
200a5('bum): nyid do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa ma da pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad
200a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu khyod rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa
200a7('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
200a8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i/ 
200b1('bum): 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de cil/ 
200b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rang byang chub bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ 
200b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
200b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar cho/ ngas rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la byang chub sems
200b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon cing / bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
200b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan
200b7('bum): nyid kyis stong pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dod pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor 'on kyang byang
200b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bur rig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug
201a1('bum): bste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten gyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
201a2('bum): dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi mgon du 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi bskyabasu 'gyur bar bya'o/ 
201a3('bum): zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
201a4('bum): zhug so// 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur bar bya'o/ 
201a5('bum): zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang / dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur/ bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
201a6('bum): chub tu yang dag par zhugaso// 'jig rten gyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa dang ded dpon dang / yongasu 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
201a7('bum): tu yang dag par zhug so// 'jig rten gyi lam du 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
201a8('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya nyi shu pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
201b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
201b2('bum): gtong ba de thams cad kyang / sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir ro// tshul khrims ci srung ba de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongasu dgrol/ 
201b3('bum): ba'i phyir ro// bzod pa ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus ci brtsom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug
201b4('bum): bsngal yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir ro// gang la bsam gtan ga/ dang la mnyam par gzhog pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir ro// 
201b5('bum): shes rab ci sgom pa de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yongasu dgrol ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha
201b6('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
201b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'gro ba'i rgyud lnga
201b8('bum): nas yongasu bton cing mi 'jigs pa'i thang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
202a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
202a3('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu bkrol zhing mi 'jigs pa'i thang bde bar mya ngan las
202a4('bum): 'das pa la rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
202a5('bum): bar 'dod cing / 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod cing 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag las sems can rnams yongasu skyob cing de dag spang ba'i phyir chos ston te// / 
202a8('bum): sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yA/ 
202b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ 'jig rten gyi mgon byed par yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla
202b2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 'jig rten gyi skyabasu gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b3('bum): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa sems can skye ba'i chos can dang / sems can rga ba'i chos can dang / sems can
202b4('bum): na ba'i chos can dang / sems can 'chi ba'i chos can dang // sems can mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'i chos can
202b5('bum): rnams skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi/ bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu bkrol zhing / phung po
202b6('bum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasasu mya ngan las bzla te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
202b7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa 'jig rten gyi bskyabasu 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202b8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med
203a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ chos thams cad 'dre ba med pas chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
203a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa yin no// gsol pa/
