272b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ 
272b8('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni/ rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel
273a1('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go chad
273a2('bum): ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel
273a3('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams
273a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis
273a5('bum): sems can thams cad dag ga gis yongasu mya ngan las ngo zla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha/ ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no// gsol
273a6('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzlas par bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgya
273a7('bum): kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
273a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub
273b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang
273b2('bum): gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa
273b3('bum): 'amad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can
273b4('bum): nyi tshe nyung zad cig go slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes chung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
273b5('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba 'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang
273b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
273b7('bum): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa
273b8('bum): ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don
274a1('bum): du go cha bgos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ yang
274a2('bum): bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang bsgom
274a3('bum): par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongasu grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha'
274a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
274a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ ma ma/ chis pa sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni// yo su 'jig/ 
274a6('bum): ma mchi pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
274a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gang sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
274a8('bum): pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ba 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
274b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274b2('bum): byin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ad ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom
274b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
274b4('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
274b5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par
274b6('bum): sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
274b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom
274b8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
275a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
275a2('bum): ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
275a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
275a4('bum): ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
275a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgomapa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par
275a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
275a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
275a8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
275b1('bum): ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom
275b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
275b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
275b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te dag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom lda na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo/ 
275b5('bum): pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi
275b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
275b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
275b8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam
276a1('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par
276a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
276a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
276a4('bum): ning chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom da ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbasgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
276a5('bum): pa'o/ 8bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phar la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgo pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
276a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
276a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
276a8('bum): nga'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
276b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang
276b2('bum): gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
276b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
276b4('bum): pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// dam ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsku
276b5('bum): pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
276b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba
276b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
276b8('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
277a1('bum): sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
277a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
277a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
277a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
277a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgo pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// 
277a6('bum): shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
277a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
277a8('bum): bsgo ba 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgo ba rnaM pA bsgo pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
277b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
277b2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha
277b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
277b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po/ 
277b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
277b6('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277b7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bskaM/ 
277b8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
278a1('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
278a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
278a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam pa/ 
278a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
278a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong / pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'dra
278a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278a7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad
278a8('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
278b1('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
278b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
278b3('bum): 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgo
278b4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsku
278b5('bum): pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
278b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
278b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam pa
278b8('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
279a1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
279a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
279a3('bum): 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ 
279a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
279a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rna par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steg shes
279a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
279a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
279a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
279b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
279b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
279b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so// 
279b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa
279b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bac+doMs
279b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
279b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
279b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
280a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par sgom
280a2('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
280a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
280a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgo dam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di
280a5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
280a6('bum): pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
280a7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
280a8('bum): 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po// 
280b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin
280b2('bum): snga bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
280b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
280b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom dpa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
280b5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
280b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// 
280b7('bum): reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
280b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// 
281a1('bum): ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam
281a2('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
281a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes
281a4('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
281a5('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgo pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281a6('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
281a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi/ 
281a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus
281b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom
281b2('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
281b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281b4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
281b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam ra bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab rgya pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom
281b6('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
281b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom
281b8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
282a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni
282a2('bum): ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
282a3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
282a4('bum): ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgon dpa'adi ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
282a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgomaba'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
282a6('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
282a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa
282a8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
282b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par
282b2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
282b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
282b4('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
282b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rna ma par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag
282b6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
282b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po 'di ni/ byed pa
282b8('bum): po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
283a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
283a2('bum): pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
283a3('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
283a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba/ 
283a5('bum): pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam
283a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
283a7('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
283a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgo
283b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
283b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don
283b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid bsgo ba rna pA bsgo 'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
283b4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
283b5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
283b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom
283b7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// / 
283b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
284a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
284a2('bum): pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa
284a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
284a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos dpo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
284a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
284a6('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgo/ 
284a7('bum): pa'o/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
284a8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam pa
284b1('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
284b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
284b3('bum): ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
284b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba/ sgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
284b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa da ni/ rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
284b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
284b7('bum): ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
284b8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam
285a1('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
285a2('bum): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
285a3('bum): pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam pa
285a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen dpo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
285a5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'gyu ra 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
285a6('bum): 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
285a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
285a8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
285b1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom
285b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
285b3('bum): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
285b4('bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ mngon par chags pa
285b5('bum): med dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// 
285b6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ byang chub sems
285b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam
285b8('bum): zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i
286a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su brtag par bya'o// 
286a2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ byang chub sems
286a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
286a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' semangs dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nang stong pa
286a5('bum): nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ nang stong pa ti/ la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ngasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang
286a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
286a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag/ 
286a8('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
286b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chen po stong pa
286b2('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
286b3('bum): pa med dam zhes/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus
286b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
286b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus ma bya sa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
286b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 
286b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma dang tha/ 
286b8('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
287a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
287a2('bum): dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ 
287a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med pa/ 
287a4('bum): zhes rnga chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
287a5('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rang gi mtsha/ na nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang // chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
287a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
287a7('bum): yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
287a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam/ 
287b1('bum): zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
287b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// yongasu brtag par bya'o// / 
287b3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems
287b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// darab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags
287b5('bum): pa med dam zhes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
287b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// 
287b7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
287b8('bum): yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stobs rnams la byang chub sems
288a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chag/ 
288a2('bum): pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu
288a4('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang sos/ ba chen po// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon pa dar chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
288a5('bum): rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la
288a6('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a7('bum): dpa' chen po// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ tshad med pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab
288a8('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/ mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
288b1('bum): pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam par thar pa rnams la man+ta/ 
288b2('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
288b3('bum): chen po// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/ byang chub sems
288b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
288b5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa/ med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la byang
288b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa
288b7('bum): med dam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ting
288b8('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
289a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
289a2('bum): chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin
289a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi 'jigs pa
289a4('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi 'ji dgas pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
289a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dgapar rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam/ zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la/ byang
289a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam
289a7('bum): zhe byas pa cwo kyang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam
289a8('bum): zhes/ snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
289b1('bum): 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
289b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b3('bum): po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
289b4('bum): pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sem/ ngas dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad
289b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// / 
289b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgya nyer lnga pa// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha
289b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa/ pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
289b8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi
290a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed
290a2('bum): pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
290a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i
290a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'a/ das kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur
290a5('bum): tamaHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyu ra tam/ zhes yongasu brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
290a6('bum): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // de'i yid phyir nur
290a7('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la
290a8('bum): byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
290b1('bum): yongasu dris shing yongasu brtag pa byas pa dang / bzungs zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
290b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi
290b3('bum): 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang yongasu 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed/ 
290b4('bum): de tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 
290b5('bum): bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa mi dngang skrag par mi 'a gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang
290b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
290b7('bum): dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 
290b8('bum): 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog
291a1('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
291a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
291a3('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
291a4('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa/ sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab
291a5('bum): 'byor skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
291a6('bum): 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsame pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon
291a7('bum): mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba med/ 
291a8('bum): pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i
291b1('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byung
291b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag bI ma thA la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
291b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol bri bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
291b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor dbasam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bas dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
291b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
291b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
291b7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo/ 
291b8('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ 
292a1('bum): rab 'byor smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'phyo/ 
292a2('bum): sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
292a3('bum): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i
292a4('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che dan po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam/ 
292a5('bum): bsarnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa ra 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ 
292a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ na mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
292a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
292a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab / 
292b1('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
292b2('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
292b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol
292b4('bum): ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ngan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rto/ dag par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ 
292b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa
292b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub
292b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
292b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
293a1('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par
293a2('bum): 'gyur/ smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
293a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
293a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ 
293a5('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog palags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig la
293a6('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ 
293a7('bum): gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sa
293a8('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
293b1('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 
293b2('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa
293b3('bum): lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
293b4('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dgyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa legs sam/ lus
293b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags
293b6('bum): sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ na mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ 
293b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ ming
293b8('bum): dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags
294a1('bum): len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
294a2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
294a3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam
294a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyi dad la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa
294a5('bum): lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lag sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sa/ ma/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 
294a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog par lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 
294a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa
294a8('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
294b1('bum): nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa
294b2('bum): lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
294b3('bum): lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa
294b4('bum): lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ rapa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyi gnas
294b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsha na ma med pa dang smon pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon
294b6('bum): par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
294b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags// 
294b8('bum): sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam
295a1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
295a2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzug la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma/ 
295a3('bum): yon no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// lus la
295a4('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzu dgas la rtog pa ma yin no// sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// / dri la rtog pa ma yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin no// 
295a5('bum): reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin/ no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin// sna'i
295a6('bum): rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la
295a7('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus
295a8('bum): te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
295b1('bum): ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i/ 
295b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i
295b3('bum): khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// na mkha'i khams la rtog pa
295b4('bum): ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du bya/ dad la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa
295b5('bum): ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no// reg pa la rto/ pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sred
295b6('bum): ba la rtog pa ma yin no// len pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
295b7('bum): pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
295b8('bum): pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa
296a1('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don
296a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa
296a3('bum): ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams
296a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyi dad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa
296a5('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog/ pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
296a6('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs
296a7('bum): rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
296a8('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma
296b1('bum): rnam par thar pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la/ 
296b2('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs
296b3('bum): nga'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin// 
296b4('bum): snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// thams cad nga shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes
296b5('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
296b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song phyogs na yang mi gnas yul na yang mi gnas gang na yang mi gnas pa
296b7('bum): ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par
296b8('bum): 'tshang rgya bar mi nus ste/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gri/ 
297a1('bum): ma yin no// rnabs ma yin no// sgras ma yin no// lces ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no// yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin no// sgyus ma
297a2('bum): yin no// dris ma yin no// ros ma yin no// reg gis ma yin no// chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// 
297a3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyis rnam par shes pas ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus
297a4('bum): rig pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yi na no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lce'i 'dute reg pas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma
297a5('bum): yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin/ 
297a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// 
297a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sa'i khams kyis ma yin no// chu'i khams kyis ma yin no// me'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyis ma
297a8('bum): yin no// namakha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no// ma rig pas ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// 
297b1('bum): ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no// skye mched drug gis ma yin no// reg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// sred pas ma yin no// len pas ma yin no// srid pas ma yin no// 
297b2('bum): skye bas ma yin no// rga shis ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bcom
297b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 
297b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen dpo stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid
297b5('bum): kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin/ no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// maH'a las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// thog ma
297b6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 
297b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 
297b8('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
298a1('bum): kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no// stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan
298a2('bum): lag brgyad pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
298a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
298a4('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no// de bzhin
298a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig/ pa rnams kyis ma yin no// byams pa chen pos ma yin// 
298a6('bum): snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// / 
298a7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
298a8('bum): pa nyid kyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams
298b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
298b2('bum): nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus nyid kyang rnam pa
298b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
298b4('bum): dri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg nyid kyang na/ dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos nyid kyang rnam
298b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
298b6('bum): pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
298b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// 
298b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
299a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa
299a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams
299a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
299a4('bum): pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid dkyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa dza
299a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid do// chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid do// me'i khams nyid kyang rnam
299a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// na mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa/ 
299a7('bum): khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes
299a8('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
299b1('bum): reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// len pa nyid kyang
299b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
299b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bzod pa/ 
299b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dra do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
299b5('bum): tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa
299b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna
299b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong
299b8('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
300a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin sto
300a2('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
300a3('bum): nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
300a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi dad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// / 
300a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
300a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid
300a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshad med pa/
