300a8('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
300b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
300b2('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo/ 
300b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// / 
300b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid do// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam
300b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dris pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi
300b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
300b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
300b8('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
301a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
301a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ 
301a3('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin nyid
301a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa da'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad
301a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga
301a6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
301a7('bum): sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad/ 
301a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
301b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid
301b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
301b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
301b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
301b5('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i rnam parashes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
301b6('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
301b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus
301b8('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
302a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
302a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
302a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
302a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
302a5('bum): pa'o mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gan
302a6('bum): pa'o/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i
302a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
302a8('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
302b1('bum): gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor/ 
302b2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
302b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
302b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// me'i khamangs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
302b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
302b6('bum): gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes
302b7('bum): ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
302b8('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
303a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
303a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
303a3('bum): pa'od skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
303a4('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de ba/ bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
303a5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig/ pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
303a6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// srid pa'i de
303a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
303a8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
303b1('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshul
303b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
303b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
303b4('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam/ gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // 
303b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhi na gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
303b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin// 
303b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
303b8('bum): pa'o nga phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
304a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
304a2('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
304a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
304a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma bya// nas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
304a5('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa ste/ nga pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
304a6('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
304a7('bum): pa'o mdor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
304a8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
304b1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma// 
304b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ 
304b3('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
304b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos
304b5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar
304b6('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin
304b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
304b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
305a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
305a2('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
305a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i
305a4('bum): bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi
305a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
305a6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
305a7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
305a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
305b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
305b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
305b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
305b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
305b5('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
305b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
305b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid/ 
305b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
306a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
306a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu brgyad do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa
306a3('bum): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka mang po
306a4('bum): khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor dbar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gdang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spri
306a5('bum): bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'ja da nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs so da pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'ad
306a6('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las
306a7('bum): 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
306a8('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
306b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams r+b+ba/ 
306b2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
306b3('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
306b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad
306b5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ga/ zugs so// sgra nyid rnaM ba thaMd mkhyen pa ste/  patha~Md mkhyen/ pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
306b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
306b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
306b8('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i
307a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// rje'i rnam par
307a2('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
307a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par she
307a4('bum): pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
307a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
307a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// / 
307a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
307a8('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
307b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
307b2('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
307b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// mye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
307b4('bum): tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyi du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tham das cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
307b5('bum): tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rta/  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
307b6('bum): tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
307b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thad
307b8('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// na mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na mkha'i
308a1('bum): khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa
308a2('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du
308a3('bum): byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
308a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ 
308a5('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
308a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thad/ 
308a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rna bapa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
308a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa tha~Md
308b1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma
308b2('bum): pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin to// / 
308b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308b4('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi/ dran pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thad
308b5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
308b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
308b7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong
308b8('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
309a1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
309a2('bum): pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las
309a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
309a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thad
309a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa
309a6('bum): nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam
309a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
309a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa
309b1('bum): nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
309b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
309b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnamaso// rdzu 'phrul
309b4('bum): gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamaso// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
309b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnamaso// stobs nyid rnam pa zad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnam so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnams
309b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
309b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags
309b8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnam so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
310a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnam so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
310a2('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnam so// mthar
310a3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamaso// rnam par thar
310a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa/ med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
310a5('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa
310a6('bum): rnamaso// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnamaso// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa dzad
310a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
310a8('bum): so mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnamaso// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
310b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnamaso// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// 
310b2('bum): snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
310b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
310b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar mi dra do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
310b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar/ med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
310b6('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// 
310b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
310b8('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
311a1('bum): steng gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
311a2('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
311a3('bum): med cing gnyi su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis/ 
311a4('bum): byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam da pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin dab de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis
311a5('bum): byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis
311a6('bum): byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar
311a7('bum): med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// 
311a8('bum): dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid
311b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid ga
311b2('bum): yin pa dang / rna ba thaMd mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad
311b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
311b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ga
311b5('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ban/ nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa
311b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lce'i rnam par
311b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lus
311b8('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar medo// 
312a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar ste/ 
312a2('bum): do mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar ma// 
312a3('bum): do rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med/ 
312a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ dpa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis
312a5('bum): byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su
312a6('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
312a7('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis// 
312a8('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
312b1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
312b2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
312b3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa dzad
312b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi dad gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
312b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// yid kyi 'dus
312b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis su
312b7('bum): byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar
312b8('bum): med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar medo// / 
313a1('bum): me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis
313a2('bum): byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar
313a3('bum): med do// na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar
313a4('bum): med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313a5('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// ma rig pa'i de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
313a6('bum): pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313a7('bum): gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313a8('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313b1('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313b2('bum): gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu
313b3('bum): med cing gnyi su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing / 
313b4('bum): gnyi su byar med do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi du gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med// 
313b5('bum): cing gnyi su byar med do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang / yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
313b6('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su mA/ 
313b7('bum): cing gnyi su byar med do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing
313b8('bum): gnyisu byar med do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing
314a1('bum): gnyis byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
314a2('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
314a3('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
314a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
314a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
314a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
314a7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
314a8('bum): rna ba zad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
314b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
314b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
314b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
314b4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig dpa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// don dam dpa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thaMd
314b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi da gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
314b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
314b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
314b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
315a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// 
315a2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 
315a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med
315a4('bum): do chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de debazhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
315a5('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rang gi mtshan nyi da stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
315a6('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
315a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyisu byar med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa zad
315a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
315b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid/ 
315b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
315b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// yang dag par spong ba
315b4('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar medo// / 
315b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da nga / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
315b6('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
315b7('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu
315b8('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
316a1('bum): med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
316a2('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
316a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi// 
316a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
316a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de ba zhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
316a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par
316a7('bum): thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyi su byar medo// / 
316a8('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
316b1('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
316b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
316b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/
