316b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhi na nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar mdo// / 
316b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med
316b7('bum): cing gnyis byar med do// mi 'dzags pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
316b8('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// 
317a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyisu byar med do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
317a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
317a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad
317a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin de nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang
317a5('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lan cig
317a6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar
317a7('bum): med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing
317a8('bum): gnyisu byar med do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu
317b1('bum): med cing gnyis byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ 
317b2('bum): med cing gnyis byar med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na// de bzhin nyid gci
317b3('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig/ 
317b4('bum): bste/ gnyis med cing gnyis byar med do// lan cig 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa na/ 
317b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis med cing gnyis med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i di bzhin nyi dgang yin padang / rnam pa zad sa dag nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
317b6('bum): bzhin cid gcig pa/ gan su med cing gnyis khyor med do// dgra bcomo pa nyid kyi bzhin kyid dgang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin dgang yin
317b7('bum): de bzhin cid gcig sa/ gan su me cidag sa byur med nga// rang sangs rgyas sri bzhin gyi dgung yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid srid bzhin ny-i gang ma
317b8('bum): padan/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// byang chub sems dpa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin da/ 
318a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
318a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes
318a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing / brtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba/ zhib mo mkhas shing
318a4('bum): rtog pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dkyi yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod/ 
318a5('bum): pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
318a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
318a7('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du sheso// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa
318a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go/ 
318b1('bum): rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid
318b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang luso// yid nyid rnam
318b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugaso// sgra nyid
318b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// 
318b5('bum): ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg/ 
318b6('bum): chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
318b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// / 
318b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma/ 
319a1('bum): bster rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
319a2('bum): nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te
319a3('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
319a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// 
319a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te/ rig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams
319a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid
319a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
319a8('bum): ba'od rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te
319b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
319b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
319b3('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tha~Md
319b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba da'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// 
319b5('bum): chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam bzla mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i kham so// me'i kham nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
319b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i kham so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khamaso// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
319b7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na mkha'i kham so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i
319b8('bum): kham so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen shis
320a1('bum): 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
320a2('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugaso// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid
320a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid
320a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len
320a5('bum): pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
320a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// 
320a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul
320a8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus
320b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa zad
320b2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
320b3('bum): pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
320b4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang
320b5('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa zad
320b6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa
320b7('bum): stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
320b8('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
321a1('bum): nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma
321a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
321a3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thad
321a4('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang da rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
321a5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
321a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med
321a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
321a8('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnamaso// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag
321b1('bum): par spong ba rnamaso// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamaso// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
321b2('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnam so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnamaso// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid ni
321b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa zad
321b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
321b5('bum): bden pa rnam so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bas gtan rnam so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
321b6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnam so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs
321b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnam so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
321b8('bum): par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamaso// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
322a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar par d+ma stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / dran/ 
322a2('bum): pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnamaso// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
322a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnamaso// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs
322a4('bum): pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i stobs rnamaso// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
322a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnam so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
322a6('bum): pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnamaso// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po
322a7('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
322a8('bum): pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 
322b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa zang
322b2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dgra bcom
322b3('bum): pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang byang chub// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
322b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'o// bla na medad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam rapa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
322b5('bum): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyadabam po nyes brgya nyer bdun pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
322b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang / 
322b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang
322b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// 
323a1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyis byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de
323a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// mig gi de bzhin
323a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang
323a4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ da gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid
323a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// lce'i de
323a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin
323a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
323a8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang
323b1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyis byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
323b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha/ 
323b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
323b4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid/ gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
323b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
323b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang / 
323b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
323b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de
324a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyisu byar med do// lce'i
324a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// 
324a3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar mdo// 
324a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi ngan pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing
324a5('bum): gnyisu byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin te/ da gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
324a6('bum): ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
324a7('bum): ba ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig/ 
324a8('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid ga
324b1('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni/ de bzhin nyid
324b2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid// 
324b3('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
324b4('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe// ra ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
324b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi da gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
324b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
324b7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// lus kyi 'dus
324b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar
325a1('bum): med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
325a2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
325a3('bum): ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
325a4('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyi ded gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
325a5('bum): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// rlung gi khams rgya de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin// 
325a6('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
325a7('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
325a8('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
325b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid ga cig pa ste/ 
325b2('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
325b3('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
325b4('bum): ste gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// skye mched drug gi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
325b5('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa zla mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na
325b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
325b7('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu
325b8('bum): med cing gnyisu byar mod do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
326a1('bum): med cing gnyi su byar med do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
326a2('bum): gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su mA/ 
326a3('bum): cing gnyisu byar med do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis
326a4('bum): byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
326a5('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshul khrims kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

330a6('bum): gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
330a7('bum): pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing / brtag tu med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phrag pa/ zhib mo mkhas shing // rtogs
330a8('bum): pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gang yang mngon par sangs
330b1('bum): ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyisu kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag na mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'a/ 
330b2('bum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
330b3('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi
330b4('bum): skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa/ med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dedag kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
330b5('bum): pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa 'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon pa'adu bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
330b6('bum): med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir
330b7('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
330b8('bum): lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byed
331a1('bum): pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor lo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mthong ba/ 
331a2('bum): po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos

331a4('bum): dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir

331a6('bum): lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir tshes 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// 
331a7('bum): lha'i bu dag mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i
331a8('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam por shes bzab pa'i phyir chos 'di 'ab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yid kyin
331b1('bum): par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i/ 
331b2('bum): bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di/ 
331b3('bum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna
331b4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir cho sa 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye na gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
331b5('bum): dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyi ra chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus ter/ ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// 
331b6('bum): lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa
331b7('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag me'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag na mkha'i khams zab
331b8('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du
332a1('bum): byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
332a2('bum): dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir
332a3('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
332a4('bum): rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir cho
332a5('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa za/ ba pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag brtson 'gru/ sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
332a6('bum): lha'i bu dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab
332a7('bum): ba'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
332a8('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'dus
332b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
332b2('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang bzhin
332b3('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
332b4('bum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab par phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dngos po med pa stong rapa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ngo
332b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lhami bu dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'iphyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gnag
332b6('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lci bu dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dbang po
332b7('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam
332b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i
333a1('bum): bu dag tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa zab
333a2('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
333a3('bum): smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gsu
333a4('bum): kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhi/ na gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// lha'i bu dag mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// 
333a5('bum): lha'i bu dag so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byams po chen po zab pa'i ra chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab hA/ 
333a6('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu
333a7('bum): dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
333a8('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang byang chub zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams ca/ 
333b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// 
333b2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni/ gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi
333b3('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i srad/

334a1('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ reg gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ migazung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ chos gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba/

334a8('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung

334b4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mau gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sa'i khams/ gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan
334b5('bum): pa ma lags/ chu'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ me'i kha mas gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du
334b6('bum): bstan pa ma lags/ rlung gi khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ na mkha'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan/

336a1('bum): / mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/

337a1('bum): slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma la/

337a4('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzug so// bdag ni gzugs can no// bdag ni tshor ba'o// bdag gis tsho
337a5('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gi 'du sheso// bdag ni 'du shes can no// bdag gi 'du byed do// bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gis
337a6('bum): rnam par shes par bya'o// bdag gi mig go/ bdag gis blta bar bya'o// bdag gau rna ba'o// bdag gis thos par bya'o// bdag gi sna'o// bdag gis bsna mo// bdag gi lce'o// 
337a7('bum): bdag gis myang bar bya'o// bdag gi luso// bdag gis reg par bya'o// bdag gi yid do// bdag ni yid cano// bdag gi gzugs so// bdag ni gzugs dang ldan pa'o// 
337a8('bum): bdag gi sgra'o// bdag ni nyan pa'o// bdag gi dri'o// bdag ni snom pa'o// bdag ni ro'o// bdag ni ro myong ba'o// bdag gi reg go// bdag ni reg par byed pa'o// bdag gi
337b1('bum): chos so// bdag ni chos shes pa'o// bdag gi mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni mig gi rnam par shes pa can no// bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni rna ba
337b2('bum): rnam par shes pa can no// bdag gi sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa can no// bdag gi lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa
337b3('bum): cano// bdag gi lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa can no// bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa can no// 
337b4('bum): bdag gi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bdag ni mig/ gi 'dus te reg pa can no// bdag gi rna ba'i 'dus/ te reg pa'o// bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa cano// 
337b5('bum): bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa cano// bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa cano// bdag gi lus
337b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o// bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa cano// bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa cano// bdag gi mig gi 'dus te reg
337b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bdag ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o// bdag gi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te// 
337b8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o// bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o// bdag gi lce
338a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o// bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// 
338a2('bum): bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o// bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun
338a3('bum): tshor ba'o// bdag gi sa'i kham so// bdag ni sa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi chu'i khamaso// bdag ni chu'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi me'i
338a4('bum): kham so// bdag ni me'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi rlung gi khamaso// bdag ni rlung gi khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi na mkha'i
338a5('bum): khamaso// bdag ni na mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i kham so// bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'dra
338a6('bum): pa'o// bdag gi ma rig pa'o// bdag ni ma rig pa cano// bdag gi 'du byed do// bdag ni 'du byed pa'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o// 
338a7('bum): bdag gi ming dang gzugaso// bdag ni ming dang gzugs cano// bdag gi skye mched drug go/ bdag ni skye mched drug cano// bdag gi reg pa'o// bdag ni reg par byed pa'o// bdag
338a8('bum): gi tshor ba'o// bdag ni tshor bar byed pa'o// bdag gi sred pa'o// bdag ni sred par byed pa'o// bdag gi len pa'o// bdag ni len pa cano// bdag gi srid pa'o// bdag ni
338b1('bum): srid pa cano// bdag gi skye ba'o// bdag ni skye ba'i chos cano// bdag gi rga shi'o// bdag ni rga shi'i chos cano// bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/ 
338b2('bum): phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
338b3('bum): pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya/ 
338b4('bum): bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag dgis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag
338b5('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang / nga pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do// 
338b6('bum): bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi phyi nang stong pa nyid// bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid// bdag gis stong pa nyid
338b7('bum): stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis don dam pa stong / 
338b8('bum): pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid// bdag gi 'dus ma
339a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi thog/ 
339a2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid// bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gom+ba pA/ 
339a3('bum): bya'o// bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gos par bya'o// bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi/ 
339a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi mi dmigasadapa stong pa nyid// bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la goms par
339a5('bum): bya'o// bdag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis da / po med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi ji dra d+ha/ da stong pa nyid// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// 
339a6('bum): bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid// bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam so// bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad
339a7('bum): par bya'o// bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnam so// bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam so// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag
339a8('bum): gi dbang po rnam so// bdag gis dbang po rnams la sprad par bya'o// bdag gi stobs rnamaso// bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnam so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan
339b1('bum): lag rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam so// 
339b2('bum): bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi bsam gtan rnam so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi tshad med pa rnam so// bdag gis tshad med
339b3('bum): pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi rnam par thar pa
339b4('bum): rnam so// bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bya/ da'o// bdag gi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ dpa rnam so// bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
339b5('bum): pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
339b6('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnam so// bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnam so// bdag gis ting nge 'dzin
339b7('bum): rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnam so// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnamaso// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
339b8('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnam so// bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la sprad par bya'o// bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnam so// bdag gis
